net.explorviz.settings.server.resources

Class UserPreferencesResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.explorviz.settings.server.resources.UserPreferencesResource

  • @Path(value="v1/users")
public class UserPreferencesResource
extends java.lang.Object
    Resource to access UserPreference, i.e. to handle user specific settings.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserPreferencesResource(UserPreferenceRepository customSettingRepo, UserPreferenceService userPrefService, AuthorizationService authorizationService)
      Creates the endpoint.

      Access preferences of a user.

      • UserPreferencesResource

        @Inject
public UserPreferencesResource(UserPreferenceRepository customSettingRepo,
                                       UserPreferenceService userPrefService,
                                       AuthorizationService authorizationService)
        Creates the endpoint.
        Parameters:
        userPrefService - service for handling user preferences
        customSettingRepo - repository for user preferences

    • Method Detail

      • getPreferencesForUser

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.api+json")
 @PermitAll
 @Path(value="{uid}/settings/preferences")
public java.util.List<net.explorviz.settings.model.UserPreference> getPreferencesForUser(@Context
                                                                                                                                                                                                  javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders headers,
                                                                                                                                                                                                  @PathParam(value="uid")
                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String uid)
        Access preferences of a user.
        Parameters:
        uid - query parameter that denotes the user.
        Returns:
        a list of all user preferences for a given user.

      • resetToDefault

        @DELETE
 @PermitAll
 @Path(value="settings/preferences/{id}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response resetToDefault(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                              java.lang.String prefId,
                                                                                                              @Context
                                                                                                              javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders headers)
        Deletes an UserPereference such that the default value applies again for the given user.
        Parameters:
        prefId - the id of the preference to delete
        204 - (not content) on success

        Updates the value of an existing setting.
        Parameters:
        prefId - the new preference content
        headers - the http headers (provided by jersey)
